main_definition: Something created or crafted by a person's own hands, often implying that it is unique, custom-made, or made with care.

meanings_and_examples.example: She received a handmade wedding gift from her grandmother.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Crafted with manual effort or traditional techniques
meanings_and_examples.example: The potter created a beautiful vase using only his hands and a wheel in the studio.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not mass-produced, typically implying higher quality or value
meanings_and_examples.example: I prefer to buy handmade shoes because they tend to last longer than factory-made ones.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Created by a specific individual rather than using pre-existing materials
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist made the sculpture entirely from recycled materials, but it was still considered handmade due to its unique design and craftsmanship.
